message.body: Hey! You've been on my mind a lot these days. How the heck are ya?!! Can't believe Summer is already over. It went by fast. Leaving for Berlin Sept 24th. Maybe see you before? Back for my bday on Oct 11th. Woot woot!!!
That sounds like a great trip. My friend Hannah has a show up now in Berlin you might like. Let's get together
Oh, cool. Let me know what gallery and I'll check it out. You doing any of the 1st Friday stuff tomorrow? Any interest? Or maybe just grabbing a beer?
I'm going to D's for dinner tomorrow maybe after we could get a drink. If not maybe Saturday. I'll Facebook message u the show details
Busy on Sat. Maybe tmrw after dinner. Let's just play it loose. I'll look for your FB msg. Thanks!
Ok great, I just sent the gallery info for Hanna's show
